title: A History of Greatness
content: 3# began while the Ammon, Matt and Trevor were studying music at Brigham Young University. They bonded over their love of jazz and improvisation and played in many ensembles together. After going their separate ways after BYU, they eventually reunited to form 3# and bring their love of jazz to everyone around them. 3# was formed in 2015, and has continued to be a source of friendship and music for them.

title: Unique and Professional
content: As long-time performing musicians, 3# understands that audiences want to have a good time at events and they want exceptional music to help turn an event into something memorable. The trio brings a joy and spontaneity to every event. They endeavor to make every performance unique to match the feel of every event. From formal weddings and corporate events to private low-key events and parties, 3# knows how to make music to fit an ambiance.
